mapper.select: select * from (select c.*, rownum as rnum, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTCNT from (select a.no, a.title, a.member_no as memberNo, b.name as memberName, a.view_cnt as viewCnt, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as regDate, a.group_no as groupNo, a.order_no as orderNo, a.depth from board2 a, member b where a.member_no = b.no #{where} order by group_no DESC, order_no ASC) c) where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
mapper.insert: insert into board2 values( board_no_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberNo}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select no, title, content, member_no as memberNo from board2 where no=#{no}
mapper.delete: delete from board2 where no=#{no} and member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.update: update board2 set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
update board2 set view_cnt=view_cnt+1 where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select nvl(max(group_no), 0) as maxGroupNo from board2
mapper.update: update board2 set order_no=order_no+1 where order_no >=#{orderNo}
